name: MLCYOLOLossLayer
desc: A layer that estimates loss for the YOLO algorithm.

items.name: init(descriptor: MLCYOLOLossDescriptor)
items.desc: Creates a YOLO loss layer with the descriptor you specify.

items.name: class MLCYOLOLossDescriptor
items.desc: The configuration object you use to create the YOLO loss layer.

items.name: var yoloLossDescriptor: MLCYOLOLossDescriptor
items.desc: The configuration object you use to create the YOLO loss layer.
